ygData.subject: RE: [sg-everquest] Solo farming
ygData.msgSnippet: Wah, look down on Wiz ah?  Ya know I solo 95% of my EQ time so far? Hehe... Actually sometime I go to low lvl dungeon for 3 reasons: - Repair fraction - Twink
ygData.messageBody:
Wah, look down on Wiz ah? Ya know I solo 95% of my EQ time so far? Hehe...

Actually sometime I go to low lvl dungeon for 3 reasons:
- Repair fraction
- Twink my char or friends' char (My UO guild is 2nd biggest in Baja shard,
quite a fewof them come over to EQ, gotta look after them mah, I'm still
their ex-GM wat, hehe).
- Like I say, I solo most of the time, basically I was away from EQ for
quite sometime and most of my timezone members already lvl 50, kinda hard
join them for dragon/plane hunt, also due to limited playtime. As a
result, I self-lvling alot at a static mobs. So sometime when I can't
stand the bore, I will take a break at those low-lvl dungeon bullying the
low-lvl mobs, ;P

Surprisingly I'm a HE wiz with Human INT (coz I dump most of my stats
points to STR when creating my char, sigh) yet still can solo most of the
time these days, hehe ;P



On Friday, 28 April, 2000 7:42 AM, Chen Lizhi
[SMTP:polarcoordinates@...] wrote:
> For a Wiz I don't think you can solo farm Sol.A, Sol.B, CT and Paw. Mobs
> there aggro to you no matter what is your level. For Perma, my 39 Druid
can
> solo any of the room other than king. Runneyeye Goblins should ignore you
at
> 50 unless you at 50, since I can walk past most at 39 without problem.
> Unrest I am not sure, but I think undeads there aggro at all level too
now.
> Befallen? You kidding me anot? Level 50 go Befallen for what? Beholder
Maze
> is a joke at 50. 1 nuke 1 EE. Sit at the throne whole day to get PBBs. WK
> Ogre camp is out. The Ogres have a very large aggro range (at large as
your
> spells) and HT. You can pull solo but I doubt if your HP can keep up with
> the HT. Thats all I know, I'm just a 39 Druid.
>
>
> >From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> >Reply-To: sg-everquest@egroups.com
> >To: "'* Singapore EQ Mailing List'" <sg-everquest@egroups.com>
> >Subject: [sg-everquest] Solo farming
> >Date: Thu, 27 Apr 2000 18:05:17 +0800
> >
> >Can someone tell me the min lvl for a wiz to solo the following
dungeons:
> >
> >Permafrost (up to King room)
> >Sol A (whole dungeon)
> >Sol B (whole dungeon or max which area/wat lvl)
> >Unrest (whole dungeon or max which area/wat lvl)
> >Paw (whole dungeon or max which area/wat lvl)
> >Befallen (whole dungeon or max which area/wat lvl)
> >Beholder Maze (whole dungeon or max which area/wat lvl)
> >Runnyeye (whole dungeon or max which area/wat lvl)
> >WK Ogre Camp
> >SRo Sprectre Island
> >CT
> >
> >Thx.
> >
> >Ziltus
> >
